mapper.select: delete from Strategy where userName=#{userName} and createrName=#{createrName} and strategyName=#{strategyName}
select * from Strategy where userName=#{userName} and createrName=#{createrName} and strategyName=#{strategyName}
select * from Strategy where userName=#{userName} and createrName=#{userName}
select * from Strategy where userName=#{userName} and createrName!=userName
